name: A Blank Canvas
description:
To save our little sister from depression, we have to dive into her subconscious and reveal what made her feel alive : painting.

"A Blank Canvas" is a plateformer game where you need to use black painting to discover and finish the level, the game was developed in 3 days by 3 peeps for the GGJ 2021

credits :

Rémy Campanals : programmation, Game and Level Design
